SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ASToD
This is a tower defense game
AttackMode
The towers target selection filter : the nearest enemy, the stringest ? pick your poison
Cell
Represents a map cell
CellType
The type of a cell used to identify buildable, spawn...
Coloured
Interface to get a simple object's colour
Drawable
Interface to unify drawable objects
Element
A unit's element, used to visually distinguish and implement weaknesses
EmptyGameException
Exception to flag litteraly empty game file
Game
Initiates the game and loops through levels
InvalidLevelException
Generic class for reporting level file issues
InvalidMapException
Flags a corrupted map
InvalidMapPathException
Flags a unreadable map location
Level
A level consists in a map, waves and a game loop to get through for the player
LevelUI
This class groups the shop and the level's information together
Map
Represents the map : stores all cells and their metadata, but not the entities
MultipleEnemySpawnException
Flags a multiple enemy spawn detection
NoEnemySpawnException
Flags a map without enemy spawn
NonExistentEntity
Thrown when someone mistypes the entity name
PathError
Used to specify which king of error happened when building enemy path
Player
Class used to represent the player and the ally base, used to buy towers and physically placed at the center of the base as the enemies' target
RechargeTask
Used to uncooldown a unit when recently fired
SpawnButton
This class allows buying towers by providing a button to place in the shop
Spawner
The object Spawner schedules the creation of new enemies and gives them to the game engine at the right time.
SpawnTask
Used to schedule an enemy spawn event
StdDraw
The StdDraw class provides a basic capability for creating drawings with your programs.
UninitializedSpawner
When the spawner is called without a proper wave loaded
Unit
Unit : an abstract class to define basics of towers and living entities.
Utils
Implementation for various graphics utilities
